item.title: How Trump’s big bill makes it easier for all Americans to get a tax break for charitable donations — not just rich people
item.description: An above-the-line deduction for charitable giving is expected to generate an estimated $74 billion for nonprofits over a decade.

item.title: How AI is going to give your financial adviser new ways to manage your money
item.description: Trusted advisers will get a new life, not a pink slip.

item.title: Free trade is over in the U.S. — and Trump’s tariffs might even be working. Investors, take note.
item.description: Tariffs will become a vital source of revenue for a government that refuses to cut spending.
